org.jcvi.jillion.experimental.align

Class AlnFileWriter.AlnFileWriterBuilder<R extends Residue,S extends Sequence<R>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvi.jillion.experimental.align.AlnFileWriter.AlnFileWriterBuilder<R,S>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - the type of Residue to be written.
    S - type of Sequence to be written.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlnFileWriter.AminoAcidAlnFileWriterBuilder, AlnFileWriter.NucleotideAlnFileWriterBuilder
    Enclosing class:
    AlnFileWriter<R extends Residue,S extends Sequence<R>>

    public abstract static class AlnFileWriter.AlnFileWriterBuilder<R extends Residue,S extends Sequence<R>>
extends Object
    AlnFileWriterBuilder is a Builder that can create new AlnFileWriter instances.
    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AlnFileWriter<R,S> build()
      Create a new AlnFileWriter instance using the configuration data provided so far.

      AlnFileWriter.AlnFileWriterBuilder<R,S> eol(String eol)
      Set end of line String to use.
      AlnFileWriter.AlnFileWriterBuilder<R,S> forceOneGroupOnly()
      Force all the alignments into one group, this has the equivalent effect of making the number of residues per group infinite.
      AlnFileWriter.AlnFileWriterBuilder<R,S> includeCumulativeCounts(boolean include)
      Include the cumulative count of residues for the seqences on each sequence line.
      AlnFileWriter.AlnFileWriterBuilder<R,S> setNumResiduesPerGroup(int n)
      Set the number of residues per "group".

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • setNumResiduesPerGroup

        public AlnFileWriter.AlnFileWriterBuilder<R,S> setNumResiduesPerGroup(int n)
        Set the number of residues per "group". If not set, then the default number of 60 residues will be used. If this method is called along with forceOneGroupOnly() then the last one called "wins".
        Parameters:
        n - the number of residues per group; must be >0.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if n <1.
        See Also:
        forceOneGroupOnly()

      • eol

        public AlnFileWriter.AlnFileWriterBuilder<R,S> eol(String eol)
        Set end of line String to use. If not set, the default is '\n'.
        Parameters:
        eol - the end of line string to use; may not be null.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if eol is null.

      • forceOneGroupOnly

        public AlnFileWriter.AlnFileWriterBuilder<R,S> forceOneGroupOnly()
        Force all the alignments into one group, this has the equivalent effect of making the number of residues per group infinite. If this method is called along with setNumResiduesPerGroup(int) then the last one called "wins".
        Returns:
        this
        See Also:
        setNumResiduesPerGroup(int)

      • build

        public AlnFileWriter<R,S> build()
                         throws IOException
        Create a new AlnFileWriter instance using the configuration data provided so far.
        Returns:
        a new AlnFileWriter; will never be null.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a problem creating the writer.

      • includeCumulativeCounts

        public AlnFileWriter.AlnFileWriterBuilder<R,S> includeCumulativeCounts(boolean include)
        Include the cumulative count of residues for the seqences on each sequence line. If this method is not called, then the writer will default to not writing out the counts (same as calling this method with false.

        If set to true, then the output will look like this: 

        ...
FOSB_MOUSE      MFQAFPGDYDSGSRCSSSPSAESQYLSSVDSFGSPPTAAASQECAGLGEMPGSFVPTVTA 60
FOSB_HUMAN      MFQAFPGDYDSGSRCSSSPSAESQYLSSVDSFGSPPTAAASQECAGLGEMPGSFVPTVTA 60
                ************************************************************

FOSB_MOUSE      ITTSQDLQWLVQPTLISSMAQSQGQPLASQPPAVDPYDMPGTSYSTPGLSAYSTGGASGS 120
FOSB_HUMAN      ITTSQDLQWLVQPTLISSMAQSQGQPLASQPPVVDPYDMPGTSYSTPGMSGYSSGGASGS 120
                ********************************.***************:*.**:******

 etc..
        Parameters:
        include - flag to include the counts or not.
        Returns:
        this.

      • createNew

        protected abstract AlnFileWriter<R,S> createNew(File f,
                                                int groupLength,
                                                String endOfLine,
                                                boolean includeCounts)
                                         throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException
